parameters.name: Config_opt
parameters.description: Configuration options as defined by swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of configuration names for this component

title: IComponent2.RemoveMaterialProperty2
description: Removes the appearance from the component.
signature:
System.Boolean RemoveMaterialProperty2( 
   System.Int32
Config_opt
,
   System.Object
Config_names
)

parameters.name: Config_opt
parameters.description: Configuration options as defined by swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of configuration names for this component

returns: True if the component's appearance is removed, false if not
remarks: This method is intended to be used on a component whose appearance has changed; for example, color.

examples.title: Remove Material Properties from Assembly Component (VBA)
